actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase from $60 to $75 the maximun amount of monthly pension that may be paid to a veteran being furnished hospital, nursing home, or domiciliary care by the Veterans' Administration.

summary.text: Increases from $60 to $75 the maximum monthly pension payable to a veteran being furnished hospital, nursing home, or domiciliary care by the Veterans Administration.
